"A.P.241/11/15": "Ahh... Marriage, huh? ...Boy, that sure sounds nice."
"Sorry for spacing out! I was just daydreaming a bit!"
"You must have heard about it too. Zeno and Echo are getting married!"
"There have been rumors floating around about them for forever, but I still can't believe it's actually happening now!"
"Wha-... Wellll... I am a girl, after all..."
"Wait, what am I saying?! This isn't about me! I should be cheering for them full force!"
"Yup! Something like this always puts a smile on people's faces! It's really amazing!"
"I've been thinking about how maybe I might too, eventually... But that's still a long ways off!"
"I'm gonna do my very, very, very best to win everyone's hearts. Then, someday I'll even win theirs..."
"...Eh, aaah! Sorry! I'm running my mouth about stupid things again!"
"J-Just ignore what I said! I'm doing all of this for the Hero class! For them! Yes! Really!!"
